snippet: A lawmaker in Nigeria’s Katsina State said a group of gunmen on motorbikes, thought to be ethnic Fulani herdsmen, went on a “killing spree.”
abstract: Gunmen on motorbikes kill at least 69 people and burn down several homes in attacks on four villages; attacks are related to conflicts over land in northwestern Nigeria.
lead_paragraph: A lawmaker in Nigeria’s Katsina State said a group of gunmen on motorbikes, thought to be ethnic Fulani herdsmen, went on a “killing spree.”

headline.main: Scores Reported Killed in Village Raids in Nigerian Land Conflict
headline.print_headline: Scores Reported Killed in Village Raids in Nigerian Land Conflict
